name: change-visualization-settings
description: Changes the appearance settings for a chart or a table.

table_columns.description: Shows or hides table columns. Use `visualization_columns` for the list of available columns.

show_columns.description: List of columns to show. Use `visualization_columns` for the list of available columns.

hide_columns.description: List of columns to hide. Use `visualization_columns` for the list of available columns.
